title: Mind altering
text: It could awaken dormant parts of the human mind and encourage expanded sensory perceptions.

title: Health benefits
text: Taken regularly, it increased life expectancy and fortified overall health levels (in many cases life expectancy was tripled);

title: Addictiveness
text: The spice had narcotic properties, thus increasing demand and creating a large and hungry market for it. An individual's addiction to the spice would worsen the more they consumed it.

title: Physical effects
text: Sustained use of the spice led to human eyes being discolored so that the entire eye would be stained blue.
